name: Classic Pancakes
method:
Step 1: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Step 2: Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg, and oil.
Step 3: Mix until smooth.
Step 4: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Step 5: Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Step 6: Brown on both sides and serve hot.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
neededIngredients: 1/2 cup mixed berries (such as strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
method:
Step 1: In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries.
Step 2: Repeat the layers until the ingredients are used up.
Step 3: Serve chilled.

name: Avocado Toast
method:
Step 1: Toast the whole grain bread until golden brown.
Step 2: Mash the ripe avocado with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Step 3: Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Step 4: Drizzle with additional olive oil and season with more salt and pepper if desired.

name: Omelette
neededIngredients: 1/4 cup diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, onions, tomatoes)
method:
Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and milk until combined.
Step 2: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Step 3: Pour the egg mixture into the skillet.
Step 4: As the eggs set, add cheese and diced vegetables to one side.
Step 5: Fold the omelette in half and cook until cheese melts.
Step 6: Serve hot.

name: Smoothie Bowl
method:
Step 1: In a blender, combine frozen banana, frozen berries, and almond milk.
Step 2: Blend until smooth.
Step 3: Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
Step 4: Top with granola and chia seeds.
Step 5: Enjoy with a spoon.
